isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Crankcase, Crankshaft, Connecting Rods, And Pistons - Connecting Rods, Pistons and Piston Rings - Checking Connecting Rod Side Clearance

svcproc.title: Checking Connecting Rod Side Clearance
svcproc.para: Use a feeler gauge to check connecting rod side clearance as follows:

step1.para: Pry apart a pair of connecting rods on a crankshaft rod journal. Insert largest feeler gauge to check clearance.
Repeat for each pair of connecting rods on each crankshaft rod journal and compare with specifications.
